类 Inventory

java.lang.Object
Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Class managing the collection of items in the player's inventory.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Inventory()
    Constructor initializes an empty inventory.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    addItem(InventoryItem item)
    Adds an item to the inventory.
    String
    getInventoryContents()
    Returns a formatted string listing all inventory items and their quantities, or null if inventory is empty.
    InventoryItem
    getItemByName(String itemName)
    Retrieves an item by its name.
    int
    getItemCount(String itemName)
    Gets the quantity of a specific item.
    List<InventoryItem>
    getItems()
    Returns a list of all items in the inventory.
    void
    removeItemByName(String name, int count)
    Removes a certain quantity of an item from the inventory by its name.

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Inventory

      public Inventory()
      Constructor initializes an empty inventory.

  • 方法详细资料

    • addItem

      public void addItem(InventoryItem item)
      Adds an item to the inventory. If the item exists, increases quantity.
      参数:
      item - Item to add.

    • removeItemByName

      public void removeItemByName(String name, int count)
      Removes a certain quantity of an item from the inventory by its name. If the quantity after removal is greater than zero, the item's quantity is reduced. If the quantity is zero or less, the item is removed from the inventory.
      参数:
      name - the name of the item to remove
      count - the quantity to remove

    • getInventoryContents

      public String getInventoryContents()
      Returns a formatted string listing all inventory items and their quantities, or null if inventory is empty.
      返回:
      String listing all inventory items with name and quantity.

    • getItemByName

      public InventoryItem getItemByName(String itemName)
      Retrieves an item by its name.
      参数:
      itemName - Name of the item.
      返回:
      InventoryItem object or null if not found.

    • getItemCount

      public int getItemCount(String itemName)
      Gets the quantity of a specific item.
      参数:
      itemName - Name of the item.
      返回:
      Quantity of the specified item.

    • getItems

      public List<InventoryItem> getItems()
      Returns a list of all items in the inventory.
      返回:
      List of InventoryItem objects.
